amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 540 from the bill which prohibits use of funds to facilitate, permit, license, or promote exports to the Cuban military or intelligence service or to any officer of the Cuban military or intelligence service, or an immediate family member thereof.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike section 540 from the bill which prohibits use of funds to facilitate, permit, license, or promote exports to the Cuban military or intelligence service or to any officer of the Cuban military or intelligence service, or an immediate family member thereof.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 273 (Roll no. 277).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Farr amendment (A040) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 273 (Roll no. 277).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Farr.
